text: Parachutes is the debut studio album by Coldplay. The album was released on 10 July, 2000. Parachutes includes the hit singles "Don't Panic", "Trouble", "Yellow", and "Shiver". == Track listing == # "Don't Panic" # "Shiver" # "Spies" # "Sparks" # "Yellow" # "Trouble" # "Parachutes" # "High Speed" # "We Never Change" # "Everything's Not Lost" Category:Coldplay albums Category:Debut albums Category:2000 albums Category:Rock albums
title: Parachutes (Coldplay album)
